content: funny cow this little buddy works up fairly quick using small amounts of yarn with minimal sewing of ears horns & snout we will be working top to bottom and in the round unless noted otherwise materials/tools worsted weight yarn in your colors of choice safety eyes pair of 9mm eyes or whatever size is appropriate for the hook and yarn you choose fiberfill stuffing hook d/3 25mm you can use whatever size you desire providing that you cannot see your stuffing yarn needle stitch marker crochet terms/special stitches magic_ring magic_ring st s stitch es slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet flo front loop only increase increase work 2 sts in the same space decrease decrease using the invisible method pick up the flo of next 2 sts yarn over & pull through 2 loops x2 4tcbs 4 treble_crochet bobble stitch yarn over x2 insert hook into st yarn over & pull through st yarn over & pull through 2 loops yarn over & pull through 2 loops x4 yarn over & pull through all 5 loops on hook page 1 of 4 copyright june 2021 head/body starting with white r1 magic_ring single_crochet x6 06 r2 increase x6 12 r3 single_crochet increase x6 18 r4 single_crochet x2 increase chg to black single_crochet x2 increase chg to white single_crochet x2 increase x4 24 r5 single_crochet x3 increase chg to black single_crochet x3 increase chg to white single_crochet x3 increase x4 30 r6 single_crochet x7 chg to black single_crochet x2 chg to white single_crochet x14 chg to black single_crochet x4 chg to white single_crochet x3 30 r7 single_crochet x23 chg to black single_crochet x2 chg to white single_crochet x5 30 r8-9 single_crochet around 30 note if you want your little buddy to have different color hands/feet be sure to change colors for the tcbs r10 single_crochet x9 4tcbs single_crochet x10 4tcbs single_crochet x9 30 r11 single_crochet around 30 r12 single_crochet chg to black single_crochet x3 chg to white single_crochet x26 30 r13 chg to black single_crochet x4 chg to white single_crochet x26 30 r14 slip_stitch ch7 starting in 2nd chain from hook working into back bumps of chain slip_stitch x6 single_crochet in same space as the first slip_stitch tail complete mark this single_crochet with a stitch marker as this will be the first stitch for this round - single_crochet x11 4tcbs single_crochet x6 4tcbs single_crochet x10 30 ~add eyes between r6-7 making sure they are centered over the bobbles with 4 stitch holes between the posts ~make sure to push your bobbles to the outside or when finished gently insert your hook behind each bobble and lightly tug to make them pop out r15 decrease single_crochet x3 x6 24 r16 decrease single_crochet x2 x6 18 stuff firmly r17 decrease single_crochet x6 12 r18 decrease x6 06 fasten_off picking up flo cinch closed and weave in tail ears make 2 with white ch5 starting in 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet 04 fasten_off leaving a 4 tail for sewing the ears between r5-6
